bibl.title: Two Christian Period Finds on Elephantine Island. An Ostrakon of the Lector Aurelios Papnouthis and A Preliminary Report on a Newly Identified Church.
bibl.note: Edition of a fragmentary ostrakon discovered by the author in the southern area of Elephantine. The "church reader" Aurelios Papnouthis acts as a witness to some transaction, Christian period. - Ruins of a newly discovered church on the west bank of Elephantine Island.
JENKINS M.R., Two Christian Period Finds on Elephantine Island. An Ostrakon of the Lector Aurelios Papnouthis and A Preliminary Report on a Newly Identified Church.
